title: My Blog
text:
Ahoy
Hello there, this is my new blog! ðŸ‘‹ I hope you find something interesting or useful here, but donâ€™t hold your breath ðŸ˜€
My reasoning for setting this up is threefold:

Iâ€™ve been posting â€˜This week in Râ€™ on LinkedIn for a while now, but wanted them to also be hosted somewhere they are easier to navigate (i.e.Â so if you miss a few weeks you can quickly scan back over them).
I want to start writing some more different types of code-based articles, so LinkedIn isnâ€™t a viable option if I want to keep everything in one place.
Iâ€™m planning to update my personal site and want to embed this blog in there, for funsies.



Me, myself and I
Iâ€™m an analytics consultant/data scientist/AI placeholder working in the UK. I use R for my work and many of the posts here will use R, but my area of interest and expertise lies in data-based web applications. By which I mean, web apps that have the primary use of analysing, visualising, or accessibilising (?) data.
In my current day job I primarily do this using R Shiny (which I am a big fan and proponent of), but I also use Python-based frameworks like FastAPI, Streamlit and Shiny for Python. Naturally all of this web app work comes with some Javascript, Typescript and UI/frontend frameworks (although Iâ€™ll admit I am slightly less comfortable with these than I am with R or Python).
